description:
Why do some of us can very quickly and easy make new friends? How do they reach an understanding with absolutely different, dissimilar people? If you are asking yourself these questions, then this course is for you.

We will not intrigue you, to answer these questions, you should not buy this course. The fact that some people instinctively know how to behave with others, what to talk about, how to listen. As a rule, these people are easier to realize themselves in the life as the ability to get along with other people is one of the most important skills. But other people also there are and they, as it happens, do not have such a great ability. And this people are most. The half of them, as a rule, get used to their fate and just go with the flow. But the second half is not willing to put up with the layouts of events and through trial and error, trying hard to purchase this useful skill to communicate with people. If you are reading this, then you no doubt possible to carry to the second fighting half. This course will be the secret weapon in your fight and will bring you closer to victory. Why will the course only closer, but will not lead to victory? Because the result depends only on yourself.

The course is based on the book by Dale Carnegie "How to Win Friends and Influence People." Despite the fact that the book was written more than half a century ago, many advice and examples given in it are still valid today. However, the course is not just a translation of the book in audio format. I will help you to correctly understand the essence of communication with people, we focus your attention on the most important aspects of the book, and, I hope, you will make right conclusions and extract the maximum benefit from this course. But remember, if you do not have a strong desire to improve your communication skills, the course will be for you a waste of time. It all depends on you.
title: How to influence people. The main methods.
